```{r}
eval <- read.delim("../data/hapmap1.eval", header = F)
evec1_pc <- round(eval[1,1] / sum(eval) * 100, 2)
evec2_pc <- round(eval[2,1] / sum(eval) * 100, 2)
evec <- read.delim("../data/hapmap1.pca.evec", skip = 1, header = F, 
                   sep = "\t")
evec <- Filter(function(x)!all(is.na(x)), evec) %>% 
  dplyr::select(!V14)
evec[evec$V13 != "Control","V13"] <- "Case"
colnames(evec) <- c("sample", paste0("pc", seq(10)), "condition")
```
